description: Discover the best hotels in San Diego, United States. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Waterfront San Diego Glamour Overlooking the Harbour with Rooftop Pool & Three Onsite Restaurants
hotels.description: Bask in the coastal elegance of InterContinental San Diego, an IHG Hotel, perfectly positioned in the heart of the city's vibrant downtown district. Overlooking the sparkling harbour and bay, this sophisticated waterfront retreat offers easy access to the historic Gaslamp Quarter, brimming with eclectic dining, shopping and entertainment. Indulge in fresh seafood at the hotel's Vistal Bar + Restaurant, enjoy a refreshing dip in the rooftop pool or explore the city's renowned craft beer scene.

hotels.title: Stylish Downtown San Diego Stay Three Eateries, Pool & Private Skybridge to Petco Park
hotels.description: Perfectly situated in the heart of the city's historic Gaslamp Quarter, this contemporary retreat offers a gateway to San Diego's unique culture, history and nightlife. Savour sumptuous Baja Californian cuisine at Tortuga restaurant, enjoy a refreshing dip in the rooftop pool or retreat to your elegantly appointed room with stunning views. When you're ready to explore, find yourself steps from the bustling Seaport Village and Petco Park, home of the San Diego Padres and connected to the hotel via a private skybridge.

hotels.title: Relaxed Bayside California Retreat next to SeaWorld San Diego
hotels.description: Indulge in Southern California beachside glamour in the fun-filled Paradise Point Resort & Spa, the closest resort to the iconic SeaWorld San Diego. You'll find everything you could want for a fun-filled family holiday here, with five swimming pools, a tranquil spa, delicious coastal cuisine, and plenty of island recreation options for you to explore. Venture out for a dip in the resort's private lake or nearby beaches, or discover San Diego's top attractions within walking distance.

hotels.vendor_name: Hotel Indigo San Diego Del Mar
hotels.title: Boutique San Diego Coastal Escape with Ocean Views
hotels.description: Experience the coastal charm of Southern California with a stay at Hotel Indigo San Diego Del Mar, an IHG Hotel. This boutique retreat offers a refreshing blend of beachside relaxation and vibrant city life. Spend your days strolling along the pristine beaches, or indulging in the regions fresh seafood at local eateries. Back at the hotel, unwind in the tranquil Spa NAâ€™MARA, take a dip in the pool, or enjoy a cocktail at the Ocean View Bar & Grill while gazing out at the coastal landscape.
